text: is a retired Japanese swimmer who won three medals at the 1962 Asian Games. He competed in the 100 m freestyle and 4 × 100 m freestyle relay events at the 1964 Summer Olympics and finished fourth in the relay. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Male freestyle swimmers Category:Swimmers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Swimmers at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Japanese male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Japan Category:Asian Games medalists in swimming Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games
title: Tadaharu Goto
